entry.title: jonschz/tikz-nfold
entry.summary:
Triple, quadruple, and n-fold paths and arrows with TikZ

tikz-nfold â€“ higher order paths in TikZ

This library adds higher-order paths to TikZ and also fixes some graphical issues with TikZ' double paths, used e.g. in wide arrows. It is also compatible with tikz-cd, adding support for triple and higher arrows. See the documentation for full details.

This package is available on CTAN. Availability on MiKTeX and TeX Live is in the works.

Installation

All files except tikz-nfold-doc.tex and tikz-nfold-doc.pdf should be installed in the tex folder.

License
